reviews.review_text: This use to work good for me but not anymore. I’ve been having issues from the past months. It keeps disconnecting very frequently. I cannot use the fastest servers anymore as they were removed. Customer service is good, but does not help resolve the issue. Very disappointed customer here.
The internet connection becomes intermittent whenever I use this VPN. Total waste of money and time. If only their customer support is helpful, but no. Frustrating.
Expressvpn best vpn for me … thank you
expressvpn is great vpn service … thank you for review

when downloading copyright materials (movies etc etc), i used a US server by ExpressVPN. am I at risk of being exposed?
should have used a hk or netherlands server had I known better!

Actually ExpressVPN can be much faster than that. Here’s what I get from an LA server at this moment: 349.13 Mbps DL and 290.98 Mbps UL. (Speedtest.net result: http://www.speedtest.net/my-result/4265930947)

Really like how they configure their iOS app by unwrapping the server list straight into the built-in Apple VPN client. All the locations in one place and the option to switch it on or off is just next to the wifi network settings. Very convenient, and I’d probably give ExpressVPN a strong 8 out of 10, if it wasnt for the rare start of connection error on the odd occassion. Saying that, I haven’t used one provider with which I could avoid these small hiccups. After all, network systems are hardly perfect, so judging by that benchmark, this service is consistent enough to use all day.

Fast service when connected, though not a huge fan of their Android app, because of the slightly annoying “%” loading screen which occasionally lags and every now and then doesn’t bother to even establish a connection (stops short at around 20%). Works very well on Windows (configured it manually) – I’ve been working with the VPN for 9 hours and it hasn’t disconnected on me yet.
No complaints for me. I use this on my business laptop for the high speeds. worth the price
Works great on west coast, no complains.

Good customer service, but pitiful streaming and download speeds from Australia to the Americas and European servers.  Very good speed within country, fair to good regionally, but that is no help for accessing European and N. American and S.American content.  Year subscription is almost expired; I am currently researching for a new vpn that can deliver faster speeds from the Americas and Europe.
